data.name: Eidolons: Netherflame
data.detailed_description:
• Sink deep into Hero Creation

    Create your own Skill Tree from over 40 types of Mastery, and your own Class Tree from 70 Class Ranks placed in the 10 Base Classes.
    Become the Architect of legendary avatars!


  • Embrace Epic Turn-based Combat

    Eidolons’ unique tactical combat system is designed to be dynamic, gritty and realistic. It allows for granular control as well as jolting surprises, and leads up to epic moments of life and death decisions.


  • Become the Tactical Mastermind

    The multitude of intricate combat rules lets you grow in Mastery, play out epic scenarios in your mind, then see them realized in action.
    You will have to mind your hero’s positioning, Focus, Stamina and Morale. Plan and scheme, take daring but calculated risks!

  • Challenge Overpowering Bosses

    In Eidolons, you will meet death in many a form - death by fire, by iron, by witchcraft and sheer terror.
    To prevail, you must embody the very idea of perseverance.
    Overcome the all-devouring despair, rise from the ashes and fight anew. Experience the joy of true Mastery. Then when you meet Her, you can Dance with Death.



  • A world permeated with Dark Lore

    Piece together fragments of esoteric scriptures, blasphemous rituals and horrifying accounts. Make deals with the horrifying creatures of Nether, unmake eldritch curses, solve mystical riddles.
    Edalar will not yield its secrets easily. To unravel its mysteries, you must wring them out from its marrow.

  • Drink In the Dark Fantasy Aesthetic

    On your quest for ultimate power you will cross a dark yet beautiful realm, explore grim and surreal locations of Ersidrian peninsula. You will see the world change before your eyes as you seek out the deathly echoes of the Netherflame.
    The atmosphere of ashen melancholy is our tribute to Disciples and Dark Souls series.

  • A gripping, sinister story of ambition, sacrifice and betrayal

    Inspired by the legendary Planescape: Torment and its lasting legacy, Eidolons does not trouble you with fetch quests or bounty hunting.
    It is focused on a singular story of a man fallen yet unrepentent, a man facing the truth of his dark desires. Whatever his end, his story will unleash a whirlwind of philosophical questions in your mind.

    In Eidolons: Netherflame , you assume the role of a ruthless mage lord Anphis, a renegade from a sinister cabal known as the Congregation.
    Hunted for his betrayal, he embraces a desperate scheme, trusting a mystic vision of his lover. A vision of his death and rebirth, his ascension to godhood.
    But so far, only his demise has come true.


    Now Anphis val Keserim is but a black wraith in the fathomless void of Nether.
    Yet his will remains steadfast. He will rise from the darkness, bring fire and ruin to all who stand between him and Netherflame’s terrible, irresistible power.
    To do this, he must use the shells of the heroes who fell victim to his boundless ambition. He must become an Eidolon Lord.



    Stand with us as we make this project a reality! Back us on IndieGoGo and help us speed up the release!

data.short_description: A dark tactical roguelike RPG with gritty turn-based combat, atmospheric dungeon exploration, deep hero customization and a Dark Souls feel, Eidolons: Netherflame pits you against fearsome bosses and tests your mastery, enfolds you in a melancholy story inspired by Planescape: Torment.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo (3.0 GHz) or AMD Athlon 64 X2 6400+ (3.2 GHz).
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB video RAM
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo (3.0 GHz) or AMD Athlon 64 X2 6400+ (3.2 GHz).
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB video RAM
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
Violence is subdued but present in the game in the form of blood splatters, visceral screams, sound of breaking bones etc. 

Game's atmosphere may create severe psychological pressure.
